CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/dishonored-2-release-date-gameplay-and-everything-you-need-to-know/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">7c9a284f-2e58-4e5c-8b55-9d496c92a944</guid><pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 00:23:34 +0000</pubDate><description>Magic and mysticism blend with arcane science and some seriously sneaky gameplay as Corvo Attano and the Princess Emily return in Dishonored 2.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet3.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/6428c398-1d58-4b33-b7c6-b56b2cdede7c/thumbnail/300x230/c457e96e299335801b74e08709d49069/emilytrailerstill1434319206.png"/><dc:creator>Nic Healey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Dishonored 2 brings back magic and stealth combat on November 11 (pictures) - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/pictures/dishonored-2-release-date-november-11-pictures/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">24c6f37d-17c3-4f7e-9fd9-aacf84915cd9</guid><pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 07:09:17 +0000</pubDate><description>Corvo Attano returns, as does the Priness Emily Kaldwin, when the sequel to 2012's Dishonored lands on November 11, 2016.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/0447f16f-b978-435f-a819-94be2eb57ef7/thumbnail/300x230/1072fdf03b142a91c7ee07d0e9402365/dishonored-2-emily.jpg"/><dc:creator>Nic Healey</dc:creator></item><item><title>Virtual Boy games as they should have been, thanks to Google Cardboard - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/virtual-boy-games-as-they-should-have-been-thanks-to-google-cardboard/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">f303651c-0d86-41c7-909a-134b5a12e544</guid><pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 11:14:22 +0000</pubDate><description>Nintendo's poor old Nintendo Virtual Boy was rightfully excoriated, but a Google Play emulator could give its games a new lease on life.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/e9c1c174-69a6-4489-b580-ca08e312b1bb/thumbnail/300x230/06470298165baa22d866a4b0b9920d44/virtualboygooglecardboard.jpg"/><dc:creator>Michelle Starr</dc:creator></item><item><title>What's more fitting than playing Doom on a chainsaw? - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/whats-more-fitting-than-playing-doom-on-a-chainsaw/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">fae4af06-fd1b-441b-b02e-0747d96f603b</guid><pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 04:56:42 +0000</pubDate><description>What do you get when you combine a toy chainsaw, Raspberry Pi Zero and Doom? Possibly the best video game console ever.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet4.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/129f5f2f-1d7c-4d05-8628-dde9c6b8d0d8/thumbnail/300x230/0e6859f511c0a9ff0344124d763f849b/painsaw.jpg"/><dc:creator>Michelle Starr</dc:creator></item><item><title>Donkey Kong player breaks world record, gets 'unbeatable' score - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/donkey-kong-player-breaks-world-record-gets-unbeatable-score/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">e20ab96a-0ee6-4882-a37a-19159a2503b2</guid><pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 13:25:12 +0000</pubDate><description>You can apparently stop trying to beat the high Donkey Kong score now. The highest score that you can possibly attain has been reached.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet1.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/10/dd9414f3-68ac-41e2-bb94-16a387f07aee/thumbnail/300x230/13089578452481eb70fcab8abc978844/kong.jpg"/><dc:creator>Michelle Starr</dc:creator></item><item><title>EcoReco M3 Electric Scooter for $849 + free shipping - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/resident-evil-getting-full-scale-offensive-from-capcom-this-year/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">b5527a49-f46b-4d5e-a1e5-421e6ee61826</guid><pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 22:07:59 +0000</pubDate><description>The franchise celebrates its 20th anniversary this year -- and it sounds like Capcom has big plans to celebrate.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/09/3d62324e-7a14-468d-ad1e-75d0d04cde87/thumbnail/300x230/e0729c7ae752eeaae848705d7b273b32/3059965-re.jpg"/><dc:creator>GameSpot Staff</dc:creator></item><item><title>New $600 Nvidia GTX card announced, faster than Titan X - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/new-600-nvidia-gtx-card-announced-faster-than-titan-x/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">00045fb2-14ca-4c4a-a527-754c29401c7d</guid><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 05:52:09 +0000</pubDate><description>Chipmaker announces the GTX 1080, which replaces the company's previous top-of-the-line card with more performance.</description><media:thumbnail url="https://cnet2.cbsistatic.com/hub/i/r/2016/05/09/993c50bb-2017-4796-a967-1d935be44aa9/thumbnail/300x230/21604f9569db2441077c26031557581d/3059185-header.jpg"/><dc:creator>GameSpot Staff</dc:creator></item><item><title>Tunisian game maker rewards top players with a cow - CNET</title><link>http://www.cnet.com/news/tunisian-game-developers-reward-top-players-with-a-real-life-cow/#ftag=CADa872701</link><guid isPermaLink="false">89fe32de-7200-42e6-aaf5-bb146a1d9f74</guid><pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 17:00:15 +0000</pubDate><description>A bovine named Pamela was given to a couple who earned top marks in a Tunisian mobile strategy game called Bagra.
